Officer Tepios:
I welcome you to the Seed of Immortality. I'm the officer Tefios! I help new travelers get comfortable here.
Although the situation has not improved, we are still trying to capture the Seed of Immortality. The only way to do this is to defeat Ekimus. This is probably our destiny.
Traveler, on behalf of His Serene Highness General Ketserus, I ask you to join us..
